summary: Email correspondence between attorneys discussing case management issues for the US v Epstein case, including protective orders and discovery rollout. The emails show coordination for a call to discuss these matters.

persons.name: Martin Weinberg
persons.context: Attorney for Jeffrey Epstein, initiating discussion about case management issues including protective orders and discovery rollout.

persons.name: Reid
persons.context: Mentioned as someone Martin Weinberg will inform about scheduling a call to discuss case management issues.

connections.description: Weinberg states he will let Reid know about scheduling a call regarding case management issues.

events.title: Email exchange on case management
events.description: Attorneys exchange emails to schedule a call to discuss case management issues for US v Epstein, including protective orders and discovery rollout.

keyFacts: The document is email correspondence from July 19, 2019 regarding the US v Epstein case.
Martin Weinberg, an attorney for Jeffrey Epstein, initiates discussion about case management issues including protective orders and discovery rollout.
The emails show coordination to schedule a call on Tuesday (likely July 23, 2019) to discuss these matters.
